meanings.definition: The quality or state of being neat, trim, and smart in appearance.
meanings.sent1: Her sprucenesses always impressed everyone at the party.
meanings.sent2: The sprucenesses of his outfit caught the attention of the judges.
meanings.sent3: The cat's sprucenesses after grooming made the dog jealous.
meanings.sent4: The sprucenesses of the garden resembled a perfectly arranged painting.
meanings.sent5: The sprucenesses of the room made it feel welcoming and cozy.

meanings.definition: The act of making something neat, trim, and smart in appearance.
meanings.sent1: His sprucenesses of the office impressed his boss.
meanings.sent2: She took pride in the sprucenesses of her garden.
meanings.sent3: The sprucenesses of the makeover surprised her friends.
meanings.sent4: The sprucenesses of the painting transformed the room.
meanings.sent5: The sprucenesses of the arrangement made the event special.
